name.ja: ハイブリッドライブ・オーブスター

requirement.en: If you have a Machine Type monster in your Graveyard, reveal 1 Level 7 or 8 Dragon Type monster in your hand to your opponent.

effect.en: Excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck. You can Special Summon 1 excavated monster with the same Level as [the Level of the monster revealed to meet the requirement] face-up to your field. Place the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.
